about_the_game:
"Magic exists all around; your whole body and mind can be a conduit."

Alice and Sophie have been in a long distance relationship since they graduated from the Ira Royal Academy for talented magic users. Sophie has stayed on campus as a researcher, while Alice ventured to the world outside of academia.

Finally, Sophie gets some time off, and the couple reunites for an onsen vacation!

However, things are not how they seem at the hot spring hotel... several mysterious events appear to target the Alice and Sophie. Is the hotel haunted, or is there a powerful magical enemy afoot?

*Death Becomes You: Yuri Onsen Vacation* occurs after the events of *Death Becomes You*. It is not required to have read *Death Becomes You* or *A Summer with the Shiba Inu* by our developer friends, but there are some references to the two games that readers may appreciate.

Features

  • Kinetic visual novel (no choices)
  • ~8,000 word story
  • Original sprite art, and 2 CGs (cutscenes)
  • Extras gallery
  • Exclusive developer Q&A
  • Steam achievements
  • (Optional) Preview mode voice acting
  • Original game jam version launch option

highlighted.name: Discover the source of the disturbance.

short_description: Alice and Sophie finally have the time to go on an onsen retreat. However, their trip gets inturrupted by mysterious magic. The last straw: "MY FOOD!!!" Will the couple be able to find the culprit and finally enjoy their vacation?
